techmeme.title: In an open letter coordinated by Meta, more than two dozen companies warned that the EU might reap fewer rewards of AI because of the bloc's tech regulations (Kim Mackrael/Wall Street Journal)
Microsoft teams up with Anduril Industries to improve the performance of Integrated Visual Augmentation System or IVAS, new combat goggles for the US Army (Anthony Capaccio/Bloomberg)
The US House Committee on Energy and Commerce advanced KOSA and COPPA 2.0 on a voice vote despite discontent from some lawmakers over last-minute changes (Adi Robertson/The Verge)
EU regulators say Microsoft's acquihire of Inflection's team will not be scrutinized under EU merger rules, after seven EU countries dropped their requests (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)
The FBI, ODNI, and CISA say Iranian hackers emailed stolen, non-public Trump campaign info to Biden campaign associates; there's no sign the recipients replied (Rebecca Falconer/Axios)
